extendedInfo.description: Serve your pirates beer, give 'em tattoos or let 'em rock out on the guitar!Rake up the doubloons with this fast-paced bar management game and try to get three stars each level!Eye patch not included.Features:- 4 themes- 60 levels- Upgrades- 3 game modes- Online hiscores- Cute pirates- Beer- MusicPRESS QUOTES"the gameplay's superb" - gizmodo.com"What's not to like?" - cnet.com"rather insane" - techradar.com"These pirates are adorable." - playandroid.com"It is definitely a unique game, sort of a diamond" - droidgamers.com"Barrr is like a young puppy: super cute and you want to play with it all the time." - androidgaming.nlThis game requests permissions for the following usage:Keeping your phone from sleeping to prevent the screen going blank while playing.Internet access for Flurry analytics and improved error reporting (we don't collect private data such as usernames).Reading phone state to pause when you're being called.Have fun and keep yer pirates happy!

reviews.title: Faultless
reviews.comment: This is a great time-management game! It runs smoothly, the graphics are really cute, and it is highly addictive! I can\'t wait for new levels!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Great time management game! I\'m quick at getting through games and this game was still able to keep me occupied for hours.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well Designed
reviews.comment: Great Game, this will be in top paid apps in no time, had tho force close after level 1 - 4 but seemed to work fine after
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful Game
reviews.comment: One of the best time management games I\'ve found so far. Polished art style, smooth controls, and plenty of replay value. Well worth 2 bucks.
reviews.author: Deborah Mathis

reviews.title: Too much fun.
reviews.comment: This has almost surpassed my love 4 angry birds. When the pirates pee... OMG... Turbo mode will sober any1 up real quick. New levels soon?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So worth it!
reviews.comment: This game is adorable without being too easy. Music is great, images are clean and play is seamless - haven\'t had any faults with it.  Although I wish we had the option to buy different equipment, or have a change of scenario, since it got a bit repetitive in the end. Overall, totally worth $2!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Surprisingly awesome.
reviews.comment: Very addictive, plays well on the tablet too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful!
reviews.comment: Difficulty increases at a reasonable pace and the various modes are a lot of fun!   I hope this company makes another game soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Enjoyed it
reviews.comment: Cute and fun!! Too little levels...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best game!!!
reviews.comment: Hours of fun! You gotta try this game!!! And the customer service is great if you have a problem. Thank You Roy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun while it lasts
reviews.comment: Great fun, highly addictive... until you\'ve done everything and are left only with endless mode. It does get old eventually, but I got many hours of fun from this. Will gladly update my rating to 5* when new levels are released.
reviews.author: Alex Bakst

reviews.title: Super fun
reviews.comment: If you like time-mamagement games at all, and especially if you like pirates, you\'ll love it.  I\'m super addicted to breaking my own high score in endless mode.  Definitely worth every penny.
reviews.author: Yi Chen

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Love it. Wish there were more levels or a Barrr2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A very good game and very, very addictive
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If u wanna waste ur battery on a game this 1 is worth it, gotta play it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please add Google Play games support
reviews.comment: Otherwise this is a great time waster!  Cloud saves and achievements would be excellent additions!
reviews.author: Terry Bodega

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Grrreat time management game...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this game. Lots of fun although getting three stars in the turbo levels is proving very challenging.
reviews.author: Sarah Teuscher

reviews.title: Cute but repetitive
reviews.comment: It drags on with  cute  characters for >60 levels....only try the free version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this game! Great time waster!
reviews.author: A Google User
